A small package for converting text to ascii, or just basic maths.

Usage:

```
import poggers  
text = 'Hello world'  
binary = poggers.Binary(text)  
print(binary)
```

The following options include:

```
poggers.Add(x, y)
poggers.Minus(x, y)
poggers.Times(x, y)
poggers.Divide(x, y)
poggers.Binary(text)
poggers.Asciify(text)
poggers.Morse(text)
```
